title: You have 10000 Clones of 3 Champions to Create an Army
body:
Who would you use to ensure victory? 

10000 {{champion:106}}s to charge and cause a shitstorm on the other side.

 {{champion:268}}  Can't have too many Azirs, also, lots and lots of soldiers.

{{champion:101}} as long range nuking artillery.

replies.body:
{{champion:17}} {{champion:105}} {{champion:74}} 

There is no god.
This army build has been brought to you by the letters N, A, C, and L.
NACL?
Actually, I should've used the lower case versions of A and L, so you get NaCl.  Appropriate for the amount of salt generated by a clone army made of THOSE three!

{{champion:27}} x 3.
RETREAT TO VICTORY.

Also, they'd be mentally broken by the laughter.
I didn't know Singed was French!
{{champion:80}} Why? Because 300 of them can hold off ten thousand. Now imagine if their were ten thousand of them.

> [{quoted}](name=Embertine,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=6OAAzndf,comment-id=0019,timestamp=2015-12-29T17:26:27.544+0000)
>
> {{champion:80}} Why? Because 300 of them can hold off ten thousand. Now imagine if their were ten thousand of them.

{{champion:80}} WE WILL BLACKEN THE SKIES WITH OUR MANDROPS, AND THE SHADE SHALL NOT SAVE YOU

I'll triple down on the Karthuses.  Who cares if the enemy grabs 10000 rakas, or even 30000 rakas, they can't stop a perfect syncro ulti of at least 30 of them at once, let alone 30000 of them.   And if the enemy is someone like Kayle?  Stagger ulties by 3 seconds in burst waves.  Fizz?  Even with that hourglass AND Banshee, you could only dodge about 5 waves of ults before they hit and you get oneshot by 1000+ Karthi ult hits.


Karthus, is, as always, the solution to these questions.

{{champion:119}}, {{champion:119}} and {{champion:119}}.

You only need one, but this way it looks 30,000 times better
{{champion:223}} Just him.  Because Nesting doll of DOOOOOMMMMMMMM!!!!!!

{{champion:10}} -ult
{{champion:26}} -ult
{{champion:16}} -ult

What did you say about dying again????

{{champion:134}} she can legit lift mountains...imagine what 10k of her could do

{{champion:268}} SHURIMA!!! (sends 30k sand soldiers into the fray)

{{champion:31}} Gotta have a front line to go with the Azir soldiers. And who better than someone who gets ridiculously harder to kill with everyone he eats :D
{{champion:107}} {{champion:28}} {{champion:238}} The unseen blade...is the deadliest.

{{champion:127}} We will bury this world in ice.
{{champion:117}} And maybe make it a bit more purple
{{champion:80}} .....reasons.

>{{champion:80}}  .....reasons.

is it just an excuse to sing "It's raining men"?

> [{quoted}](name=Blue Moon Wolf,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=6OAAzndf,comment-id=000b0000,timestamp=2015-12-29T14:44:29.241+0000)
>
> is it just an excuse to sing "It's raining men"?

yes! haha I was playing on my alternate account once waisted off my ass playing panth and every time I ulted would type "its raining men" in all chat. No one else thought it was funny though :(.

{{champion:201}} because Braum standing behind Braum will create a paradoxical wormhole that will instantly suck everyone who isn't Braum into an oblivion from which they cannot escape.
{{champion:38}} {{champion:56}} because they won't mind the oblivion they get sucked into.

Also there's a {{champion:98}} , but don't mind him. He's doing Tai Bo at base minding his own business. He would have been sucked into the wormhole but if that had happened the wormhole would have no Tai Bo instructor and the wormhole knows this.
3x{{champion:30}} EZZZZ. nothing can stop 30,000 synchronized kathus ults

Oh there is a Zhonya . Where is the synchronized ult now ?

Yo dawg, I heard you like armies...

CHARGE MY BROTHERS!

{{champion:83}}
So I heard you like clones... {{champion:35}} {{champion:82}} {{champion:83}}
{{champion:103}} {{champion:82}} {{champion:16}}
XXX slaves and medical care !

I'll just use my Top 3 Mastery Champs so
{{champion:21}} SO... MANY... BULLETS!
{{champion:254}} BREAK ALL THE FACES
{{champion:37}} You can't have an Army without an awesome theme song

{{champion:105}} 1000 untargetable mobile damage dealers with cc
{{champion:74}} 3000 turret fortress
{{champion:107}} HAVE FUN

{{champion:7}} "It's all smoke and mirrors."
{{champion:89}} Front-line defense.
{{champion:69}} They all proc each other's poison. lol

Let's see... We got....
{{champion:111}} Giant super death machines that could shatter the earth beneath them in a single step,
{{champion:82}} A warlord that almost conquered the earth as one, so imagine 10,000,
{{champion:102}} And a bunch of half dragons to create the ultimate fire storm.
Yeah I think I'm ready to win every battle ever.
{{champion:53}} Then again, if you watch starwars, then replace each Stormtrooper shot with a hook you'll get the average solo q Blitz player aim.

{{champion:62}}: since wukong's clones are supposed to behave more like this:
http://i1042.photobucket.com/albums/b430/bluemoonwolf8/wi9xj_zpskpuhcegw.gif
Even just 5 clones per kong X 10000 Wukongs= an unstoppable army monkey foot soldiers.

{{champion:150}}: My special task force. Send them off in small groups and hope that god has mercy for my enemies, cause they won't receive any from me nor my Gnars >:3

{{champion:82}}: 10000 dead enemies= 10000 pets for my mordes. It's game over when you can weaponize enemies souls to essentially double the size of your army.

As you can see, my plan is to overwhelm my enemies with sheer numbers.
http://static2.businessinsider.com/image/53ab350aecad04256922ef9e/lion%20king,%20scar,%20marching.gif

10,000 Shacos = 10,000 clones - Useful for guerilla tactics. Kill 1, die in a flurry of knives as you actually shot a clone.

10,000 Illaois - Drown them in tentacles as the Shacos and their clones swoop in

10,000 Jinxes - Explosions and AOE everywhere.
